ValidationRule.description: This validation rule will prevent Team to close the Support Request without adding it to a Release
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK(Add_to_a_Release__c) && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Closed") && (RecordTypeId <> '012d0000001tZk3') && !ISPICKVAL(Type__c , "Training Issue") && !ISPICKVAL(Type__c , "Account Request") && !ISPICKVAL(Type__c , "Password Reset") && !ISPICKVAL(Type__c , "ServiceNow Request") && !ISPICKVAL(Type__c , "Support Request Enhancement") && $User.CalAtlas_Business_Team_Member__c = false
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Support Request cannot be closed without adding it to a Release
